summary: A test suite that runs nightly regression checks on the UniDiffuser pipelines for various tasks (image‑to‑text, joint, text‑to‑image) using half‑precision inference, providing setup, teardown, and utilities for fixed latent and input data.
business_intent: Automatically verify that UniDiffuser models continue to produce correct results after code changes, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable FP16 performance for production deployments.
